mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHORITIES VALUES (#{memberId}, #{authoritiesMember}, #{authoritiesManager, jdbcType=NULL}, #{authoritiesAdmin, jdbcType=NULL})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PW, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_TEL, A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER, A.AUTHORITIES_MANAGER, A.AUTHORITIES_ADMIN FROM MEMBER M, AUTHORITIES A WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{param}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*+ INDEX_DESC(BOARD_ASK BOARD_ASK_PK) */ ROWNUM RN, BOARD_ASK_NUMBER, BOARD_ASK_MEMBER_ID, BOARD_ASK_DATE, BOARD_ASK_TITLE, BOARD_ASK_CONTENT, BOARD_ASK_STATE, BOARD_ASK_TYPE FROM BOARD_ASK WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and BOARD_ASK_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*+ INDEX_DESC(R BOARD_REVIEW_PK) */ ROWNUM RN, R.BOARD_REVIEW_NUMBER, R.BOARD_REVIEW_MEMBER_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, R.BOARD_REVIEW_SCORE, R.BOARD_REVIEW_DATE, R.BOARD_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.BOARD_REVIEW_IMG, R.BOARD_REVIEW_IMGPATH, R.BOARD_REVIEW_THUMBNAIL, R.BOARD_REVIEW_PRODUCT_CODE FROM PRODUCT P, BOARD_REVIEW R WHERE R.BOARD_REVIEW_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and R.BOARD_REVIEW_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*+ INDEX_DESC(PO PRODUCT_ORDER_PK) */ ROWNUM RN, OL.*, PO.*, P.* FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_ORDER PO, PRODUCT_ORDER_LIST OL WHERE PO.ORDER_NUMBER = OL.ORDER_LIST_ORDER_NUMBER AND OL.ORDER_LIST_PRODUCT = P.PRODUCT_CODE AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND PO.ORDER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_ORDER_LIST,PRODUCT WHERE ORDER_LIST_ORDER_NUMBER = #{param} AND PRODUCT_CODE = ORDER_LIST_PRODUCT
